about.text:
Hello!
My name is Nikola. One day I was bored and wanted to do something, so I started writing this project. It was intended to be only a 2 week endeavor, however with me constantly getting new ideas, it took more than a month. It is made with React and it is my first finished React project, despite the numerous times I have worked with the framework. I have to say that it was a great learning experience.
